post:
Hi,

Because I'm no longer using it I'm selling my turnkeyinternet server.
I have been very happy with their support: fast and accurate.


It's the Q9550 on this page: http://turnkeyinternet.net/overstock/

With these differences:

* 19$/month if paid 1 year in advance (instead of 29$/month)

* 20 TB monthly traffic instead of 10 TB

It is currently running Proxmox 3.1 with 1 IPv4 and NAT and reverse proxy (Nginx) to the guest systems (both KVM as OpenVZ).
It can be installed with Windows 2012 web edition for 5$/month (+ 50$ setup fee)

My (1 year) contract ends November, 18 2014.

Feel free to send any serious offer by PM.
